meanings.definition: A person who is deep in thought or contemplation.
meanings.sent1: The musers in the library were lost in their books.
meanings.sent2: The group of musers sat quietly, lost in their own thoughts.
meanings.sent3: The muser stared out the window, lost in contemplation.
meanings.sent4: She was a muser, diving deep into the ocean of her own thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The old man was known in the village as the wise muser.

meanings.definition: To be absorbed in thought or daydreaming.
meanings.sent1: She musers about her future while lying on the grass.
meanings.sent2: He often musers during class, staring out the window.
meanings.sent3: The child musered about flying to the moon on a paper airplane.
meanings.sent4: Her mind musers through the clouds of imagination.
meanings.sent5: As she walked, she musered about the mysteries of the universe.

meanings.definition: To ponder or meditate on something.
meanings.sent1: He musers on the meaning of life every night before bed.
meanings.sent2: She musers over the decision, unsure of what to choose.
meanings.sent3: The cat musers on the edge of the table, contemplating its next move.
meanings.sent4: The artist musers on the blank canvas, seeking inspiration.
meanings.sent5: As the sun set, she musered on the beauty of nature.
